title: • Buffalo Bill Cody’s Wild West Show starts touring; it becomes one of the most popular forms of entertainment in the Western world. 1887 • German sociologist Ferdinand Tönnies writes about the replacement of Gemeinschaft, or community, with Gesellschaft, which describes modern society
